topics.body:
God; I'm so worried about that Unravel game.

People are legitimately excited about a nice family man creating a good game and there's a million fucking ways this could go bad and I really don't want it to:
1)*EA*
2)Hipster shits on tumblr tearing his ass a new one cause he's not in their personal circle of friends
3)Loltaku
4)*EA*
5)*EA*
6)*E FUCKING A*
7)Polygon
. .
34578)*E* "God damn it why do you have to suck the soul out of every one of your employees that try to actually make any good games" *A*
. .
399788888888)I wouldn't be surprised if his boss tells him to shove in micro-transactions
. .
∞)They could bastardize his game in the last second
∞+1)They could give him a ridiculous sales quota and fuck him over that way


!http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/979/556/2f8.png!

You want to know how /v/ is reacting to the game? "For the love of god protect him".
